title: 3 Fire Fox Icons in Apps; doesn't want to be the default
content:
How to I delete three Fire Fox icons found in Apps? Two show up in the taskbar tray and I am constantly being asked if Fire Fox should be my Default.

Also, refreshing Fire Fox changed all my options. For example, when Fire Fox opened, there were two rows of internet choices from "mail" to "dictionary"; now, a plain white screen.

I'm about to give up on Fire Fox and follow the herd with Microsoft forever! It seems every time Microsoft has an "update", two things happen: I have problems with Fire Fox and my phone rings off from folks I've never done business with; any connection?

Thanks in advance for your help. Computers are a necessary evil!
creator: joedoksjr

content: Terima kasih kerana berhubung. Bagaimanakah saya boleh membantu anda hari i?
creator: whatappwhatsapp430

title: how to stop updates for Version 132.0.2 (64-bit)
content:
Hi.

Every time Firefox updates it signs me out of all my open tabs. Until Firefox can do updates without signing me out of everything I do not want to update. How can I stop updates for Version 132.0.2 (64-bit)?

Thanks.
creator: JesicaDB

title: Firefox won't load PBS.com  Works in Safari OK.
content: When I load PBS.org I get a message that PBS is having connectivity issues. I can load it on Safari without any problems (and my Kindle too). Is this Firefox or PBS's problem? Please help.
creator: edkarleski

title: My extensions and color theme gone after firefox update
content:
Firefox doesn't look or act anything like my firefox did before the most recent update. My Roboform extension/add-in is now not installed/active and I can't figure out a way to enable it. It shows up in the list of extensions as disabled, but there is no button or explanation for why it was disabled - even when I use the instructions on your help section.

Two questions: How do I get my Roboform and other extensions enabled?

How do I turn off auto update with Firefox? These kinds of change without notice are unaccesptable.
creator: charlynn95

title: Can't See Incoming Email Addresses
content: I can no longer see the incoming email addresses.
creator: Tembo

title: Sidebar
content: Today when I launched the browser, a sidebar appeared. No matter what I tried, I can't remove it, it really gets in the way, I searched for information all over the Internet, but I still couldn't find any information. How can I remove the sidebar?
creator: dshumskij3

title: Blokování reklam
content: Ahoj Moziláci.Potřeboval bych píchnout.Né však do břicha.Zrušil jsem Windou a instaloval mi kamarád linux.No tady se mi nedaří najít adblock a asi se to jmenuje jinak.Nejsem zrovna zdatný,ale snad to zvládnu nainstalovat a spustit.Poradíte mi?Díky Jirka.
creator: strechykrizek

title: Hot Links, on eBay Pages
content: All of a sudden, when I'm on eBay, a lot of the hot links, embedded on an eBay "for sale" item don't work. Sometimes, when I (repeatedly) hit "Reload Current Page", they start working, or become "hot", as they should be. I wrote eBay, but no response. I don't know, if it's their problem, or something wrong with Firefox. Thanks, in advance, David
creator: davidkpar72

title: Anuncios
content: Quiero bloquear anuncios no quiero verlos el bloqueador no lo bloquea todo cómo en androide , que pasa ?

title: पेटीएम से गलत नंबर पर पैसे चला जाए तो क्या करें ??
